profile.webDeveloper:
Software engineer.
Web artisan.
AI enthusiast.
Often sleep deprived.

about.title: About me
about.text: I have been a highly committed, tenacious and resilient passionate developer for ten years, taking care as much of the design of my interfaces as the clarity of my code. I am able to quickly take part in a team thanks to my great social skills and enthusiasm.

fullStackWebDeveloper.title: Web Engineer
fullStackWebDeveloper.textPart1:
Participating to the development of the new accident detection version. The build of the version requires the reconstruction of new APIs as well as to adapt some visuals.
For more details about Liberty Rider, you can visit liberty-rider.com.

reactEngineer.title: React Software Engineer
reactEngineer.textPart1:
Developer on the project Services by Airbus.
My mission is to work with a team of consultants, discuss and propose the appropriate solutions for the wanted functionalities.
For an overview of the project, please visit services.airbus.com.

javascriptEngineer.title: JavaScript Software Engineer
javascriptEngineer.textPart1:
My mission was to maintain and add new features to MyCFM web portal, collaborate with team around the world (India, U.S., France) and provide solutions to customer requests.
For an overview of the project, please visit mycfmportal.com.

angular2Developer.title: Angular developer
angular2Developer.textPart1: Development of a responsive Facebook application, allowing users to compute their psychological relationships with friends following their answers to a quiz.
angular2Developer.textPart2: Use of the typescript language, with the framework 2 Angular and Facebook libraries, Firebase, Hammerjs, Semantic-UI.

phpDeveloper1.title: PHP developer
phpDeveloper1.textPart1: Foundation of a startup building a web and mobile platform for a more modern course management between pupils and teachers.

wordpressDeveloper.title: Wordpress developer
wordpressDeveloper.textPart1: Design of a Wordpress website for a customer.
wordpressDeveloper.textPart2: Development of custom Wordpress modules to fit the customer's needs.

phpDeveloper2.title: PHP developer
phpDeveloper2.textPart1: Design and development of a web platform aiming for an easier hiring management.
phpDeveloper2.textPart2: Built with PHP, Javascript and Ajax technology.

tradingBot.title: Trading bot
tradingBot.description:
Realization of a trading robot for crypto currencies.
He is able to trade on Gdax and Binance. The architecture of the robot makes it capable of trading in any market.
It has some adaptability capabilities in the market, and a large number of configurations that can change its behavior completely.
The source code of the project is not made public.

sniphub.title: SnipHub
sniphub.description:
SnipHub is a collaborative platform for sharing snippets (reusable pieces of code). Reinventing the wheel often is a burden, searching the web to find an answer is often too, SnipHub was created to centralize all these recurring snippets in the life of a developer.
Projects available at sniphub.io

easyjs.title: Framework Node.js
easyjs.description:
Realization of the framework easy.js, a framework fullstack for the environment Node.js, accompanied by a cli. This framework aims to provide a scalable and stable architecture for all types of backend projects based on Node.js.
Source code available on my GitHub.

neuralNetwork.title: Neural network (deep learning)
neuralNetwork.description:
Integral creation of a multilayer perceptron neuron network, with an architecture and a trainer in order to be able to build a network of any size and to train it.
Source code available on my GitHub.

others.title: Others
others.description: Others kind of projects are present on my GitHub: github.com/MadDeveloper

master.title: Mastere chef de projet ingénieurie logicielle
master.text: In the process of obtaining the title Mastere chef de projet ingénieurie logicielle.

licence.title: Bachelor of Science
licence.text: Bachelor of Science in software development and computer networks.
